member.name: T:SmallCLexicalAnalyzer.LexicalAnalyzer
member.summary:
A LexicalAnalyzer that uses State objects to traverse a DFA.
NextToken Gets the next token OpenProgram Opens a new program CloseProgram Closes the currently open program
member.remarks:
The LexicalAnalyzer class makes use of the Singleton design pattern so there will only ever be one instance of a LexicalAnalyzer. To access the methods use the following:
LexicalAnalyzer lexicalAnalyzer = LexicalAnalyzer.Instance

member.value: Private Dictionary of the keywords for the language

member.name: M:SmallCLexicalAnalyzer.LexicalAnalyzer.NextToken
member.summary: Gets the next token available from

member.name: T:SmallCLexicalAnalyzer.State
member.summary:
A State the LexicalAnalyzer can be in Contains following methods:
State Initializes a new instance of the class
State Initializes a new instance of the class
AddToDictionary Adds a key/value pair to the dictionary
GetDestination Gets the destination state for a given char
member.remarks: The LexicalAnalyzer can have one to many states

member.value: A private dictionary that represents the state transition for for this State with keys of type char and values of type4 State

member.value: Gets and private sets the Name

member.name: P:SmallCLexicalAnalyzer.State.Accepting
member.value: Returns if the state is an accepting state

member.value: Returns if the state is a dead state
